page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN DEVIZES.
page.content: The major source of employment in Devizes is Roundway Hospital where there are many types of jobs. Factories making cardboard boxes, electrical parts and food also employ substantial numbers of people in the Town. The two big construction firms, have long connections with Devizes,and employ many tradesmen to carry out their building contracts. Kennet District Council have their offices in Devizes and provide another source of employment,particularly secretarial work,as well as those jobs involving maintenance of community services. A job centre was set up in Devizes in 1969 and has a staff of five.It has about 6-700 vacancies a year involving about twenty different types of occupations and had seventy-five jobs available in the area in June 1985.
